Desc.entry: An independent, voluntary, self-help group producing and promoting locally grown organic food. Has expertise in all aspects of organic fruit, vegetable, herb production and marketing. Registered as a charitable trust for education, health and the alleviation of poverty. Delivers courses on the theoretical, practical and cultural issues of organic production.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Fri 10am-4pm, also have sessions at other sites, please contact for details
